Rep. Denver Riggleman (R-Va.), on his third trip to Israel, told JNS that visiting for the first time as an elected official exposed how the U.S.-Israel relationship is “all about shared values of freedom.” https://www.jns.org/republicans-say-bipartisan-goodwill-generated-on-israel-trip-will-not-be-hijacked-by-attention-grabbers/ …

In August 1969 Hurricane Camille hit Virginia, dropping more than 25 inches of rain in a single night and creating one of the worst natural disasters in Va. history. This weekend, on its 50th anniversary, we remember the impact it had on our communities https://www.dailyprogress.com/news/state/from-the-archives-photos-of-damage-from-hurricane-camille-the/collection_75287029-469a-5532-9394-85400d432c96.html …
